channel.title: Friend can not run client - Error PLEASE help
channel.description:
This is a PI 317 client.
Please help, this is my friends info Classpath:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin
Path:
CLASSPATH=C:\Windows\System32;C:\Program Files\Java\Jre6\bin;
Error: The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: Jframe Caused by java.lang.classnotfoundexception Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<unknownsource> at java.security.accesscontroller.dopriveileged<Native Method> at java.net.UrlClassLoader.findClass<unknown Source> at Java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<unknown source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<unknown source> Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will Exit. Press any key to continue...
This is what the run.bat file is...
@echo off title Exion Client cd bin java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
This works PERFECTLY for me, never get an error, but when my friend tries to run it this happens... please help

item.title: Friend can not run client - Error PLEASE help
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

Crazyjackson78:

thank you so much

no problem, hope it solved issue

item.title: Friend can not run client - Error PLEASE help
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

haha ok, I ran into this and its an easy fix :). make sure he has the same JDK as you have or you used when you made the server/client

hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Friend can not run client - Error PLEASE help
item.dc:creator: @Crazyjackson78 Crazyjackson78
item.description:
@Crazyjackson78 wrote:

This is a PI 317 client.

Please help, this is my friends info
Classpath:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin

Path:

CLASSPATH=C:\Windows\System32;C:\Program Files\Java\Jre6\bin;

Error:
The system cannot find the path specified.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: Jframe
Caused by java.lang.classnotfoundexception Jframe
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run
at java.security.accesscontroller.dopriveileged
at java.net.UrlClassLoader.findClass
at Java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will Exit.
Press any key to continue…

This is what the run.bat file is…

@echo off
title Exion Client
cd bin
java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

This works PERFECTLY for me, never get an error, but when my friend tries to run it this happens… please help

Read full topic
